member.name: CurveChannel
member.summary: The CurveChannel enumeration specifies which color channels are affected by a ColorCurve bitmap adjustment.

member.name: CurveChannel.CurveChannelAll
member.summary: Specifies that the color adjustment applies to all channels.

member.name: CurveChannel.CurveChannelRed
member.summary: Specifies that the color adjustment applies only to the red channel.

member.name: CurveChannel.CurveChannelGreen
member.summary: Specifies that the color adjustment applies only to the green channel.

member.name: CurveChannel.CurveChannelBlue
member.summary: Specifies that the color adjustment applies only to the blue channel.
